channel.title: Schools on Portfolio - AMatisse
channel.description: Recent content in Schools on Portfolio - AMatisse

item.description:
During my master’s degree, I worked on various projects across different domains:

Web Development

  • Time Manager: Built a management application using Vue.js, Elixir Phoenix, PostgreSQL, Docker, Ionic, and Kubernetes
  • The Count Of Money: Developed a cryptocurrency platform with Vue.js, Node.js Express, MongoDB, and Docker
  • Epic Road Trip: Created a trip planning website using React, Node.js, MongoDB, Redux, Cypress, and Mocha
  • End Of Study Project: Implemented a local handmade products marketplace using React Next.js, Nest.js, PostgreSQL, and Docker

AI & Big Data

  • Zoidberg 2: Developed X-ray image analysis for pneumonia detection using NumPy, Pandas, TensorFlow, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn
  • Travel Order Resolver: Built a voice-command route optimization system using NumPy, SciPy, Geograpy, and spaCy
  • Recommander: Created a product recommendation system using Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib, and K-means clustering

Network & System Administration

  • DevOps: Implemented shared hosting infrastructure using GitLab CI/CD, Debian, and Ansible

During my two-year technical degree, I achieved excellent academic results with a final grade of 15.3/20. The program focused on:

First Year - General IT Skills

  • Core computer science fundamentals
  • Basic programming concepts and algorithms
  • Network infrastructure and administration
  • Database management systems
  • General subjects (English, Mathematics, Communication)

Second Year - Software Development Specialization

  • Object-oriented programming (Java, C#)
  • Web development (PHP, JavaScript)
  • Database design and SQL
  • Software architecture and design patterns
  • Project management and development methodologies

During my bachelor’s degree completed in work-study program, I specialized in web development through intensive projects:

Web Development Projects

  • Built modern web applications using React, Vue.js, and Angular frameworks
  • Developed REST APIs with Node.js and PHP
  • Implemented responsive and mobile-first interfaces
  • Managed databases with SQL and NoSQL solutions
  • Server Configuration and Administration
  • Client and Server-side Web Programming

Professional Experience

  • Worked as a full-stack developer in a professional environment
  • Participated in complete project lifecycles from design to deployment
  • Applied agile methodologies in real-world scenarios
  • Gained hands-on experience with Docker containerization

Technical Skills

  • Modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries
  • Backend development and API design
  • Mobile development with Ionic
  • Version control and collaborative development

Additional Areas of Study

  • UI/UX Design and Human-Computer Interaction
  • French Digital Law
  • Project Management
  • Professional Communication
